systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

properties.Description: Properties specific to the monitor resource.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

provisioningState.Description: Flag specifying if the resource provisioning state as tracked by ARM.

monitoringStatus.Description: Flag specifying if the resource monitoring is enabled or disabled.

marketplaceSubscriptionStatus.Description: Flag specifying the Marketplace Subscription Status of the resource. If payment is not made in time, the resource will go in Suspended state.

enterpriseAppId.Description: The Id of the Enterprise App used for Single sign on.

singleSignOnUrl.Description: The login URL specific to this Logz Organization.

emailAddress.Description: Email of the user used by Logz for contacting them if needed

phoneNumber.Description: Phone number of the user used by Logz for contacting them if needed

usageType.Description: different usage type like PAYG/COMMITTED. this could be enum

billingCycle.Description: different billing cycles like MONTHLY/WEEKLY. this could be enum

planDetails.Description: plan id as published by Logz

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

properties.Description: Definition of the properties for a TagRules resource.

provisioningState.Description: Flag specifying if the resource provisioning state as tracked by ARM.

logRules.Description: Set of rules for sending logs for the Monitor resource.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

sendAadLogs.Description: Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendSubscriptionLogs.Description: Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendActivityLogs.Description: Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.Description: List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured. If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.

name.Description: The name (also known as the key) of the tag.

action.Description: Valid actions for a filtering tag. Exclusion takes priority over inclusion.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

singleSignOnState.Description: Various states of the SSO resource

enterpriseAppId.Description: The Id of the Enterprise App used for Single sign-on.

singleSignOnUrl.Description: The login URL specific to this Logz Organization.

provisioningState.Description: Flag specifying if the resource provisioning state as tracked by ARM.
